website_summaries.verdict: A no-frills, battery-operated musical mobile with an impressive selection of songs.
pros: Features user-friendly play/pause, previous/next, and volume controls
Comes with a generous selection of 60 songs
Effectively saves battery life by automatically switching off after 30 mins
cons: Arm and other extras need to be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Oh how I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I used it to replace the wind up musical mobile that came with my mobile. It plays for quite a while, about a half hour or so. The music is absolutely beautiful! It's not nursery lullabies, but music like Canon in D, Beauty and the Beast, and other songs that I actually enjoy listening to. It can easily put me to sleep in the middle of the night if I turn it on while feeding baby. Please let me know if you found this review helpful and feel free to comment if you have any questions!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonaholicTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Are the positive reviews fake?
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this read reviews and thought it would be worth the extra cash for a nice sound and lots of tunes. But the speaker is terrible and the tunes sound just like any other cheap mobile. Hard to believe there are 60 songs based on how quickly you hear the same one again. The way people were raving about it makes me think some of the reviews must have been paid for. It's just to hard to believe they are talking about the same product I received
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Burt

customer_reviews.title: I ordered another as the product got such good reviews, I thought maybe I got a defective ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 4 of these.. First one worked for 2 months, I ordered another as the product got such good reviews, I thought maybe I got a defective one... BAD IDEA 2nd one delivered and there was nothing in the envelope! 3rd one- worked for 20 seconds and 4th one worked for about a minute. I think the quality has changed as I see a lot of recent reviews are not good. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT! Thankfully I did get my money back for all 4!
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: I like all the songs this thing has, but it eats batteries like nothing I have ever seen. We sometimes use it for a minute or two while putting our kid in the crib to go wash hands after diaper changes, so maybe once a day for a few minutes, and the batteries only last 2 weeks if we're lucky. We thought the batteries were bad and replaced them with the same results. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Steele

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I made a "Harry Potter" mobile for my sons room and had been looking for this exact product, I just didn't know what it was called. I am so happy with this purchase, it moves the right speed but as far as I can tell the speed is not adjustable. The feature that sold me on this unit specifically is that it has volume buttons, it can go from fairly loud or it can be turned down all the way to mute it. The spinning can be stopped as well. I have this attached to a simple screw hook in the ceiling and the mobile attaches by a split ring, both went on with ease. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: 1911guy

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Man, where was this thing for my first kid? We had a wind up mobile which played the same song and lasted maybe 2 minutes. This thing plays a 60 different songs and lasts for 30 minutes. You can adjust the volume too, so good for light sleepers and heavy sleepers who like noise to fall asleep. My 6 month old loves it and I haven't had to change the batteries yet after 2 months of daily use. Wish I would have found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: I love the Disney and Ghibli songs in addition to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I love the Disney and Ghibli songs in addition to the classic nursery songs. With my first child I had a traditional wind up mobile and it lasted maybe 1 minute which was never long enough to suit my baby. This plays for thirty minutes before shutting itself off and I it should be pretty apparent how much of a stress reducer it is to not have to stop and wind the music up every minute while trying to soothe a fussy baby. Plus, my older child loves singing the familiar songs to our newborn while it plays.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 20 minutes new out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I am so confused with the amount of positive reviews because this product died after using it for 20 minutes new out of the box. The reviews must be fake. The first one I received was obviously used as the batter cap was crooked and the screw was stripped. Amazon promptly send a second one. Installed the batteries and the music played for 20 minutes while spinning but the music suddenly died. Tried all the buttons but nothing worked. Motor continuously spins and the only way to stop it, is by removing the batteries. Very disappointed as the songs were actually good. If it actually worked and didn’t break so fast it would be 5 stars. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: May B.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I happy with what I got for the money, we had a wind up box that came with our mobile and it only ran 5 minutes and was a pain to keep winding. This solved that problem perfectly. It plays for a long time and has lots of songs, they are short though but that doesn't bother me personally. It has a volume control which is great, because my son loves Disney music box on Spotify so sometimes we turn this down and just have it spinning so he can listen to the radio. The only issue I have is the motor is a bit loud, it doesn't bother my son but I find it a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this nursery mobile! Just what I was hoping for. The short "intro" tunes sound very nice and are soothing. I love the Disney songs. (I also like that the songs are not super annoying like most other children's toys.) The buttons are easy to press. I like that you can turn it on and off, as needed. The auto shut-off feature is great, too. Another feature is that you can turn off the spin/turn function. My baby girl (6 1/2 weeks old) is just starting to take notice of/focus on the mobile and seems to enjoy the songs. I will update the review once she becomes more aware of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alontra

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing thensound quality is great and there is a wide variety of good songs that are not annoying at all! Mobes at a good speed I just wish the sticker and putting were in a more neutral color that was why I almost passed on this but im glad I didn't! Love love so worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Kendra P

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months. Really enjoyed it at first.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I loved the variety of songs, the volume control, the motion it provided to our mobile. What I do not like is that just 4 months after we started using it, the power button stopped working. The rotation and music were constantly on, which of course is just a waste of batteries when the baby isn't actually in the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Plays songs from Studio Ghibli!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Studio Ghibli movie, Kiki's Delivery Service, has a wonderful soundtrack. Imagine my surprise and delight when songs from the movie started to play on this mobile! It also plays songs from Disney, famous classical pieces, popular lullaby, and some pop songs! The arrangements are great! Unlike other musical devices (mobiles, bouncers, swings, etc) the music quality is quite good! Other devices sound grainy and have very few volume levels. Not this one! The lullaby quality is clear and there are many different volume levels.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this musical mobile for my grand-daughter. She loved it! My daughter and her husband, my husband and I find it very easy to use. The songs keep playing- it is battery operated. We've had it for a year and it is running in the original batteries which are easy to install. It soothes our 1 year old granddaughter now and entertained and soothed her when she was very. There are The sound is beautiful. A large variety of songs. High quality all around. I bought on basis of reviews and rating, which are accurate. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Panda Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best Mobile Box, Love
customer_reviews.text: Loves this!! Its rhe second time i bought it. The first one was for my first born. Unfortunately i didnt still have it so i purchased it a again for my second. I love that it is battery powered. No winding, just hit the button. It automatically turns off after a half hour. Volume is easy to control. You can either turn off thr rotate ir the music so you dont have to have both on. I did receive on that had a humming when spinning but the return was easy. Amazon gave me 30 days to return it, so i kept the humming one until i received the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sbird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: ORIGINAL REVIEW:Its exactly as described! So excited for this! I was so annoyed with the wind up ones breaking, we saw this one and decided to try it. Pop in some rechargeable batteries and you're set! I love the fact at how long it lasts! Yeah, the bright yellow doesn't go with every nursery color/theme, including mine, but that's something so minor that I easily overlooked. So excited to try it out through the night. I was only able to turn it on and test it just to make sure it worked as soon as it arrived. If anything changes, I'll be sure to change the review. But as of now, I say its definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Update: Very poor battery life. Need replacing once per month with usage every other day for 10 min each. Original: This mobile has adjustable sound; you can turn volume up/down or turn the volume off altogether while the mobile continues to spin. The music is also pleasant (shocking considering many baby music toys are unpleasant and annoying). The mobile plays snippets of famaliar songs, mostly Disney tunes. My son is 5 months old and he loves staring at his mobile while the music plays. The music is not overstimulating for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Love this musical gadget!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's twins had this on each of their crib mobiles. It was great. Love the sweet songs, not just the same couple over and over. Awesome volume control from loud enough to hear over crying to volume off while mobile still turns. Volume off came in handy when both mobiles turned on for twins cribs but could silent one instead of clashing songs and sounds of 2 mobiles. Highly recommend. We used with a separately purchased simple mobile and a mobile arm attachment for the crib. But it might be adaptable to a full mobile, not sure.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Many steps up from the standard
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great - SOOOOOO much better than the dinky ones that come with the kits that wind up and are loud enough to wake the dead. Plus the quality of music is also much higher - it sounds like a music box. I bought a kit with arms and mounts and the music box that came with it was a total joke - even the connectors were non-compatible (hooks not fitting through eyes, etc.) Ended up using the mounts, discarding the arms and music box, buying the Shiloh as my music and motor, and attaching my own danglies. Turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy F

customer_reviews.title: Love this mobile!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this! We swapped out our mobile cuz the old one only had 6 songs that weren’t all that calming and didn’t have volume control. I love the variety of songs on the shiloh mobile. Sounds from Disney movies and even Studio Ghibli! I was pleasantly surprised when I heard the song from Totoro. I also love the volume control and the spin control. Having the option to just play music without the rotation or having the rotation without music is nice. Also it’s nice that it has an automatic shutoff after 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect mobile! The tunes are good quality and the selection is rich and beautiful. There are buttons on each side for volume control. You can also turn the music down to 0 and just have it spin the hanging mobile toys attached to it. It plays for half an hour, I believe, and then automatically shuts off. No need to crank the thing up every 60 seconds! I regret we didn't have something like this for our first baby. At the price, it's an absolute winner and a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Great motor
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than the standard cheapo motor that usually comes with mobiles. The sound quality is WAY better, the volume control is great, it can spin with no volume at all, it is battery operated (so no rewinding every 3 minutrs) and it plays clips of a ton of songs (including lots of Disney songs, which I am a huge fan of). The only sort of cons are that the motor makes a quiet, rhythmic noise when I use it without the music (but our baby seem to like it) and it turns off after about 20 minutes. Still so glad I bought this, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: scott landen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the baby
customer_reviews.text: Note: you need a base for this. I bought a mobile with a hand crank and it only lasts a couple minutes. Totally not long enough to eat a small meal. I use the base to hold this model. This thing is great; adjustable volume, huge music selection. I take it off the base and use it during bathtime. FYI, a lot of the songs are from Japanese media. I was not aware of this when I bought it. It has a lot of ghibli anime, and Japanese artists that are ated using musical box notes. A full list can be found on the pictures. Not a complaint. Just a note.
customer_reviews.author: rayzredge

customer_reviews.title: It started SMOKING!
customer_reviews.text: I put batteries in the product and instantly smelt a burning plastic smell... it took me a moment to realize it was the mobile and it noticed it was smoking! If I could give no stars I would! I would never, ever buy another one even if it were a fluke! I would not feel comfortable putting this anywhere near my baby let alone hanging it above her crib!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud rotation noise -like crickets
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product, but I'm finding it hard. I'm wondering if it's broken. When rotating it sounds like there's a box of crickets above the cradle. It's so loud. It had such amazing reviews and I didn't see anything obvious about this problem being common so maybe there's something wrong with it?? Couldn't figure out how to contact the seller. I surgically got it because I could turn the music off but wow it's loud. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra F.

customer_reviews.title: Battery guzzler
customer_reviews.text: Love this product when it works. Plays a ton of music and lets you skip through to different tracks. Also allows you to spin the mobile without music at all. However, I’ve only had this item for 3 months and have already replaced the batteries 4 times, even though we’ve barely used it and always turn it off when we’re done. Ours must have a short or something, I really don’t think I should have gone through 16 batteries already. We have never left it on for more than 20 minutes at a time, our baby doesn’t sleep in her crib yet. Love it otherwise. Just haven’t used it in weeks because we ran out of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Body

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. The hook and loop to attach to my mobile are small, so I know the mobile is secure, but they aren’t so small that it’s difficult to install. The songs are really pretty, and I love that they’re instrumentals. It’s nice that there’s a variety, because most mobiles and kids toys play the same few songs and it drives me batty. The controls are easy to understand, and it works exactly as described. I also love the auto shutoff; I had a hard time finding a mobile with that feature. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: haha) and I especially love all the themes by Joe Hisaishi from Miyazaki's movies ...
customer_reviews.text: Song listings are lovely (a couple are a bit too sad-sounding as they are in a minor key, haha) and I especially love all the themes by Joe Hisaishi from Miyazaki's movies (Studio Ghibli, anyone?). It has very good volume range and I love that you can skip songs, too! Really great options for a mobile!! The only thing I'd change is to have two hooks instead of 1--perhaps 1 with a clasp that opened? I know it's prob for safety reasons that it's a closed loop, but I had to attach it to my crib connection using a paper clip. Looks silly, but works! Overall, I'd most def purchase it again and definitely recommend it to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Our previous turn crank mobile broken when I accidentally over cranked it so I quickly searched Amazon for a replacement as it keeps the baby entertained! This item is a much better replacement as it is battery operated so I no longer have to crank! There are a variety of songs and it plays a short piece of each song. It has volume control which is nice to be able to adjust based on the surrounding noise. Thankful for prime shipping to get this product ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!!! I loved our old mobile but it only played five songs and broke. So the fact that there was a replacement with so many songs at such a great price!!! We were excited. Takes two triple A batteries. I love that there is adjustable volume control and you can turn off and on the spin. I wish I recognized more of the songs but it all sounds beautiful — don’t love the yellow logo design wish it was a more neutral color for those who like things to match. A beige or white would have been nicer Update: a week of use, motor is kind of loud will knock off a star for it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works for SHORT period of time
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get a mobile motor that was battery operated vs. the traditional wind up. It worked fine the first few times, but after having it for five months (using it routinely for only 2 naps/ day in the past month), there is an annoying squeaking when the motor rotates. It sounds similar to crickets chirping. Now I can only play the music without the rotation bc the squeaking interferes with baby sleeping. Also, as a side note, this product only runs the music for 30 minutes at a time and then has an auto shutoff; I wish it was longer. Very disappointed in product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gtishome

customer_reviews.title: Keeps his attention
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice musical mobile because it doesn't play just one song over and over and over! Being able to change out the mobile hanging from the hook has been an advantage too. It has been well worth what it cost. My only problem with it is the way it connects to the crib. There is no place on the crib where the screw-type connector fits securely. This is a common problem with these things, but I wish someone would come up with a more versatile way of connection.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase. got one for each kid! =D
customer_reviews.text: had another child so this is my second purchase since my toddler still loves to listen to his at bedtime. it sounds like a mechanical music box, plays for a good 30 minutes and turns off on its own, plus has a reasonable number of songs so you don't get bored. there is a skip, rewind and volume up and down button. also a button to have the mobile rotate or be stationary. all in all very convenient and worth the buy. very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: mishy177

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product - Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, the motor turns very smoothly, the packaged songs are nice and pretty varied, volume control works great and you can mute the songs while still having the mobile turn (which most mobiles cannot do on Amazon). You can also have the songs play without the mobile turning. Solid construction, and even though it came direct from china it only took a week to be delivered. Really very very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The motor stopped rotating after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this mobile. My daughter started napping in her crib after we got it, however the motor stopped rotating 2 weeks after it arrived. The music still works, it plays for approx 20-30 minutes then shuts off automatically. I wish the mobile still rotated though. I haven’t been able to find a way to contact the company, I hope they see this and respond so we can fix the issue and I can change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Orchier

customer_reviews.title: Bedtime Win
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous when I read about the songs and pitches of the songs before I purchased this but I’m happy I did. My son pulled on his and his Mobile was no longer spinning. I was happy I was able to buy this at a much lower cost than a whole new mobile. This plays Disney songs which I love, it spins faster than our mobile originally did, it was perfect and exactly what we needed. I love that it has volume control and you can turn it on without music. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for making your own mobile
customer_reviews.text: My son's nursery is Harry Potter themed so i ended up making him a mobile. I found a music box that played the harry potter theme song but it only lasted 20-30 secs and it had to be manually wound. My son would get frustrated when it turned off right away. Then i got this one it changed everything! It plays musically continuously by the press of a button and the best part there is a lot of disney songs on it!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly9484

customer_reviews.title: SO happy with this purchase! Volume control and pleasant music are major wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheaper battery-operated mobile motor that stopped turning. I almost didn't spend the extra money to get this more expensive motor, but I am so glad I did! (The other options I was looking at were $8-$10 and this one was $18). This is SO worth the extra money. Being able to control volume (or turn the volume off) is wonderful. Our last motor I had to put Duct tape over the speaker because it was so loud. I also love the variety of songs, and the tone of the music is pleasant. It actually sounds like music rather than an annoying melody line. I cannot recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Beaver, Columbia SC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked the mobile motor. But now we're on our 2nd one and we're still having issues. The first one the volume down button stopped working after 2 weeks. The 2nd one we had delivered on Dec 7th and as of last night it won't shut off. I'm really disappointed because I liked being able to control the music volume & I liked how many different songs it played when I wanted the music to play.
customer_reviews.author: xinnamongirl

customer_reviews.title: I wish I knew about this product sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product! I wish I would have bought it sooner, this is helping so much with my fussy baby.... The original peice that came with the mobile I bought, you had to hand crank was so loud it would wake my baby up when he was almost asleep. I’m a huge fan of the mix of lullabies, Studio Ghibli and, Disney songs this has! Other people have complained about the back needing to be unscrewed to replace batteries(personally I’m a fan of it that way I know the batteries won’t fall on my baby) This product is very easy to use and the sound is very clear, the volume can go louder than I was expecting it to.
customer_reviews.author: Biancakarlsbarch

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: So I absolutely love this. My baby just turned two months old and loves it also. I don’t have anything bad to say about it, except, it just stopped working. I changed the batteries and all that, but when I turn it on, only the spinner works, and the music won’t come on. It’s really disappointing.. especially since he has only been in his crib for less than 2 weeks so it’s not like this even got heavy use. I’d return it for another one, but I purchased it when I was still pregnant, so the return date has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Dani LP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work consistently
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great when it works and my twins love it but it rarely actually works. The music will play for a short time and then won't start again when I push the power button. I haven't been able to change songs. I thought it would play through all the songs and would go for a good bit of time but it does not. It's about the same amout of time as the motor you turn to crank up, only you can't do this multiple times. Also, it didn't come with instructions
customer_reviews.author: A. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Grinding loudly after several months
customer_reviews.text: Initially this product was great. However, after about 7 months, it started grinding as it turned the mobile. Nothing would fix it. I contacted the seller and they refused replace it. They said to bang on it, and if that didn't work, then the problem was likely caused by dust, humidity or hanging something too heavy on the product. Well, here's the problem with those theories...The room is not humid or dusty, and the only thing ever hanging on it is the mobile, which is not heavy. So, I would not recommend this product unless you only want something that's going to work for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Can't gush about this enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my son was a teeny tiny tot and LOVED his mobile! Cranking that loud thing was the absolute worst! So I thought about trying battery operated motors and this was the Amazon recommended item, and I'm so glad it was! Great value for this! It plays for about 25-30 minutes and it cuts itself off! I recommend this to all my friends when they are preparing for their own babies. You can use it on any mobile arm and with any toys, so this was awesome to use with his crib set I had already gotten him.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gosa

customer_reviews.title: Great for diy mobiles
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find a mobile that I liked for our nursery, so I decided to make my own. This music box was perfect because it offers a ton of different songs. The music is clear with great volume control and baby loves it. She’s been picky about music she likes and this instantly calms her down and gets her cooing. It’s just a little large, which should be kept in mind depending on the weight of decorations on the mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This has a good set of music to play and also easy to turn on, off, mute and rotate. However, after only two months use and several batteries later, it makes an awful sound and will probably break soon. The motor sounds like it might be dying. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible song selection that is fun for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I added this to a $12 mobile I bought at resale. I LOVE this more than the mobile. The music selection is vast and so incredible. From Swab Lake, to Miyazaki movies like Howl's Moving Castle, to Disney classics like Peter Pan. It has such an incredible selection of songs that are pleasing to the ear and a delight for babies. The mechanism does whir a little bit when in rotation, but it is a small price to pay for such an incredible device.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Another mobile was sent not what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: We received a musical mobile today, but it is not what was ordered/pictured. There is no way to change the song, there is just a turn dial and when the song is played it sounds broken. Contacting seller to figure out what happened. Hopefully we can get this resolved. Very disappointed right now trying to get the nursery ready.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: On of our favorite baby accessories!
customer_reviews.text: Our mobile originally came with a hand-cranked unit to play a song and rotate, and fortunately/unfortunately, our little one LOVED it. But it only gave a few minutes of diversion. This battery-powered product is a favorite, with its timer to shut off automatically and the ability to change volume and songs, little one loves it as much as us. The batteries last a very long time (we haven't changed them in 3+months) and we'd recommend it to others without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Russn

customer_reviews.title: IT's THE BEST one out there.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SO MUCH! We bought a standard kinda thinking why would you spend so much money well.... the other kind you have to hand crank like a music box which is find but they don't play music for long and the abruptly stop which usually left my son just staring me instead of falling asleep. But this one you just click and it goes, you can adjust the volume and set a timer or just let it go for forever. ALSO there are sooooooo many different song which is great because a person can only listen to "you are my sunshine" so many times. AMAZON product so happy we spent the money
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is WAY better than the one that came with our mobile! And considering we bought a Disney one, we were so disappointed. This was the first item to come up when I searched for a replacement, and for good reason! There are so many options! You can turn off the spin on the mobile if you just want music, or vice versa. There are tons of songs, and you can skip and go back whenever you want. And the sound lasts for a LONG time compared to those wind up ones. Such a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade if you have a mechanical wind-up drive
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use - a real upgrade to the poorly-made wind-up drive that came with our mobile, which sounded really horrible and only played for a few minutes before needing another loud wind-up. The sound on this is pretty good, has many different lullaby songs, the drive is silent, and it just works exactly as expected. Very easy to swap and it has a 30 minute timer and will cycle through songs before shutting itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Orchestra of crickets..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's mobile. We absolutely love the songs it plays.. they have music from the Lion King to music from princess mononoke. Anyway, I out her down in her crib and turned this on right after putting in batteries and I started hearing crickets. After listening for a while and determining where the noise was coming from.. I was disappointed.. hearing all these beautiful songs but with a orchestra of crickets in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a life saver! The original mobile that came with the actual toy part was just a wind up.. the second you wound it up and walked away it was dead.. this thing goes on for I think 20 minutes, which is amazing! Plus the songs are really cool! Just wish you could select one and leave it on a loop play instead of it cycling though all of them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these that I got with the mobile at Pottery barn and it stopped working. This one is way better! It plays several different songs and for 30 min before it turns off and I can adjust the volume! My little loves it! It turns the animals on her mobile kind of slow and it dropped them down considerable which I don't really like but other than that it's a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If only it would play complete songs...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the song variety. Ranges from anime, classical, Disney aaand even XJapan (j- rock) aaand it's all great. Thr settings are easy enough to use on each side of the device and it also comes with a spinning bottom for attachments. Only bummer, and this might just me not knowing how to change this, is each song is only a short sample- a few seconds long. Would it play full songs I'd give it 10 stars. It is misleading stating it plays 60 songs when each song is no more than 15-30 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Momiji

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: Updated 6/23/17: seller sent a third replacement free of charge. Arrived perfectly and works like a charm. Speaker quality is amazingly good for the size. Original review: In theory this looks great; however, my first order arrived with a broken battery cover (not safe for infants), and the replacement has both a defective button and a grinding noise for the motor. Not to mention the sticker orientation is incorrect (which would be forgivable if nothing else was wrong). Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: RationaleAndReason

customer_reviews.title: Great music, very soothing, good mechanics
customer_reviews.text: We have used this with our daughter for more than two years now. I can honestly say I’m still not tired of the music. There are enough tracks that it doesn’t get too redundant on daily use. The music is familiar, pleasant and nice relaxing tones. We originally bought this for a DIY mobile but we now just use the music box and love it for traveling. We replace Batteries about every 2 months but we use it daily (1h each day). Really pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: bessy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing my original mobile with a windup music box, I can tell you this totally worth the money. My windup one would stop every couple seconds which was so annoying. This one I don’t have to worry about it stopping right away. The music is great. I especially like the Disney Tunes! My only complaint is I wish you had the option of letting it play longer than 30 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Annie E. Schavelin

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this musical mobile! The sound is great and so is the music selection. I’ve used this with moderate use for 10 months now and the batteries are just now draining power. Definitely one of my favorite baby buys. The only things I would do to improve upon this are 1. Be able to select the length of time to run it and, 2. Be able to control it remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his mobile; however, I was getting tired of the loud Brahm's Lullaby that kept playing. This is awesome, you can adjust the volume and the large variety of songs will ensure that your little one (and you) will not get bored as easily. I especially love hearing the Disney songs mixed in and will catch myself singing along.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great music box
customer_reviews.text: I received the musical mobile today; fast delivery. I'm going to use it to make a special crib mobile for our grandson's crib at our house. I hope he likes it because I LOVE THE MUSIC! 60 songs!! I bought another music mobile earlier, but it plays 12 traditional baby tunes and, it is too loud with no volume control. I recognize some of the songs but they all sound so pleasant and easy to listen to (which I may do even when our grandson isn't here)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The good: Plays a large variety of tunes with nice music box style sound. Quality construction. Volume is adjustable and stays at the last level used, which is great because you don't have to change it every time you turn the thing on. I like that you can have rotation only, sound only, or both together. The bad: My only complaint is that you can't set a specific song to repeat. It also shuts off after 30 minutes and an option to let it play would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Such a huge benefit to have
customer_reviews.text: I really cannot say enough good things about this purchase. My son absolutely loves his animal mobile but the wind up one that came with the mobile was such a piece of junk. We had it not even a month before it broke. This did not site well with the little one, he needed answers on why his animals stopped moving. I bought this mobile and he has been happy ever since. Not only does it last longer than the constant winding of the original but it sounds great and give my son such enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT have 60 songs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular one because it said it has 60+ songs, so I thought "great!"... in about 5 minutes the songs start looping. and they're ALL Disney songs!!!!! No 'Twinkle twinkle little star' or any of the classic songs... it's still cute and does the work, but it's sooo monotonous and repetitive it gets too boring too fast.
customer_reviews.author: katz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Mobile Motor!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby products I've found!. I made a mobile and wanted a battery operated musical mobile motor. This one not only works well, but has the best song collection I've ever seen. It's so cute! It works really well. You can have it spin or not and play music or be silent. It doesn't include an arm to hang it with, but I didn't want one anyways because you have to take it down before the baby can reach it. I hung mine from the ceiling on a chain from home depot so I can adjust it as the baby gets older. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Cute songs!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! The one that came with my crib arm only played 1 song for 2 minutes, and I would have to keep winding it back up to play again. I would have to do that like 10 times while I tried to get housework done. This music box is PERFECT! And plays lots of different beautiful tunes. Great buy! And my baby loves it :) it’s on right now, and playing “it’s a small world” super cute, we love it! Ps, it just switched to the next song, which is “can you feel the love tonight” So worth it
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love this mobile
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally found one I can use and keep. We’ve spent over $50 on several mobiles only on the music part of our baby’s crib mobile. They usually stop after a few minutes and the music is not too soft, some have songs that are not even for bedtime. So I got this one and I’m glad I did because the music is just perfect and it last like 30mins also I like that it rotates slowly and I can adjust the volume, our baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Yhdez

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile for my twin girls...separate control over the music and rotation.
customer_reviews.text: I have twin girls so I have two cribs needs two mobiles running at the same time. I bought first two which I had to manually turn and music were always mismatch. Then I found this mobile on amazon which as separate switches for the music and rotation, volume control, music selection. Now I can just turn on music on one mobile and make both mobiles rotated; or, I can just leave on mobile music on as a background music soothing my twin girls while they drinking milk or sleeping. Life saving, great buy and nice price too!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Throw out your stupid wind up mobile right now
customer_reviews.text: Man, at first I almost chucked this thing because it stopped playing music after 1.5 songs and then I couldn't even get it to stop the spinning function. I thought for sure it was defective. But I put in different batteries and it worked perfectly. So, if this happens to you, before you toss it out the window and leave a scathing review, try fresh batteries. Otherwise, man I love it. 30 minutes of straight functionality without me having to run to the crib to wind it every 2 minutes. And the music is great. I've heard Tchaikovsky, Rachmaninov and plenty of Disney tunes as well. This thing has my baby girl smiling ear to ear.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Senior

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!!! Had a crank motor previously which worked for 2 weeks before fizzling out which was an issue not only because of quality but because our LO just LOVES her mobile. Meaning every time the thing stopped I would have to crank it to prevent her from fussing. This battery powered one is amazing for the convenience, price, music and features included. So happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: pepper88

customer_reviews.title: Love the Music
customer_reviews.text: The music selections are wonderful and peaceful. I knew most of them and one specific my 5 year old recognized as from the movie "My Friend Totoro" which was a hit in our house. The music can be turned up or down easily. The turning mechanism easily turned on/off and I was able to hang my handmade mobile from the plastic hanging hook. The top was easily fastened with something and I made it customized to my needs, so it worked for what I wanted it to do. My infant son enjoys the music very much as well.
customer_reviews.author: EAGENR

customer_reviews.title: It was purchased when I found out my son loved his mobile
customer_reviews.text: A must have, in my opinion. It was purchased when I found out my son loved his mobile, but it only played one song and for maybe 2 minutes. This mobile is perfect. It plays continuously, has number of different songs, and the volume can be adjusted or turned off completely. Definitely worth the ten dollars. Hopefully it lasts longer than two weeks, which seems to be the common consensus of this product. Will return to alter the review if that should be the case.
customer_reviews.author: A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Stong and diverse in melodies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mobile! I feel like every time it plays I am hearing a different song! It's strong and rotates well despite the fact that I made my own mobile and it's a little heavy. It fit perfectly on the mobile arm I purchased here on amazon from another company. It has volume functions and I can turn the sound off completely, as well as loop a particular song, if you like. My only complaint is that I wish it had a song list included, because some of the songs I just can't place!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite baby products!
customer_reviews.text: It is important to have music in my child’s life. This is an awesome little lullaby player. It’s all the same little bell/chime instrument. It’s harmonic, like someone got all the MIDI files of these tunes and stuck it to the same chime instrument. Nonetheless, it’s exactly what I wanted. My baby isn’t old enough for the big crib yet, so we haven’t even installed it to the felt mobile I bought. I put it near her before bed, and when she transitions to the crib, it will go with her. It’s so adorable sound. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We bought this to hang from the ceiling now that our baby needs a mobile that is totally out of reach. We can hang any mobile we want from it, and it will rotate. I love that it plays lots of different songs and that the volume is super adjustable. We are able to hang it on the ceiling each time with a grabber it is well out of baby’s reach.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves her mobile, but the crank up one that came with the mobile arm would only go for about 3 minutes so we were constantly in her room winding it up over and over again. This mobile motor is great! I love the auto shutoff feature after 30 minutes. It has so many great songs, including a bunch of Disney tunes. It helps our baby fall asleep each night and the price is a steal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until it quit working. The buttons on the side that turn it on and off and control volume got stuck. They weren’t “clicking” when pushed like before. I opened it up, and saw the problem. The plastic housing behind all three buttons on that side had crumbled. The plastic housing is a thin plastic, and apparently breaks down!!?? It was totally crumbled! So no way to repair. I was upset because this is lovely sounding and I like the song choices!! Big “BOO!!” I hoe the seller sees this and responds. That would be amazing!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. The mobile we originally bought came with a hand crank that would last for all of 30 seconds or so. I like that we could use this with our mobile so it didn’t go to waste! Also, this has a huge selection of music so you get a lot of variety and I also love how you have the option of turning the sound off while the mobile plays if you want to keep baby distracted but want a bit of “quiet time”. Might also be helpful for some babies to fall asleep as they watch a mobile go round , although that is NOt the case with my baby unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mobile isn’t ‘tinny’ and metallic sounding like the one that originally came with my mobile. I love that you can control the volume and even mute it if you want to just have it spin. My personal preference would be if the songs were a bit longer. Maybe instead of sixty 30 second songs, there could be thirty 1 minute long songs. But that’s just me!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just wish I could turn off the automatic shut off.
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE this little guy. I just wish there was a continuous play function. It shuts off automatically after 30 minutes which wakes my girl up during nap time. :( Otherwise the songs are great, good variety, volume control. It does make some noise while it’s spinning, a high pitched squeak accompanies the melodies. I think this is from use or my mobile is too heavy for the hook? I’ve had it for a few weeks and it seemed to start just the last few days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described, nice familiar and recognizable tunes. Lots of classic disney songs (From Aladdin, Beauty and thee Beast, Snow White, Lion King etc), classic lullabies. Have had it for several weeks now and have not had to change the battery. Great that you dont have to keep on winding it over and over to hear the same tune. I only wish it had different timer settings, 30-60-90 min for example. But works great and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jail murse 808

customer_reviews.title: BEST baby mobile EVER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mobile. Lots of beautiful classical music - havent heard a repeat song yet. Spins a little fast but my baby adores it. Haven't let it play itself out to assess exactly how long it would play, but I have NO real complaints. Can hear the little motor turning, so if those noises bother you, that would be something to consider, but we love it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Lovely music selection- squeaky gears
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful! Has a lovely variety of Disney, Ghibli, and classical tunes. However, after a couple of months of use, I can clearly hear the rotation mechanism squeaking LOUDLY over the music. Baby does not seem to mind, but it drives me a little nuts. Especially if we turn the music down because we have people over and want to talk while baby is still entertained- all anyone hears is the squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kiesel

customer_reviews.title: This Costs Very Little But Plays and Operates Like It Cost A Fortune
customer_reviews.text: Our Granddaughter is 9 months old now and she still smiles when we turn this on! The musical notes are beautiful and not at all fake or digital sounding like other music boxes/mobiles. The volume control is perfect; in fact, the buttons are very quiet when pushed. An added bonus is the ability to skip forward or backward, and the duration before it automatically shuts off is perfect. After 9 months of solid playing, it hasn't developed the worn, noisy mechanics of constant use like some devices or toys. We have no complaints and are still in awe with it. This will not let you or your infant down.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Very good option for making your own mobile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my own mobile for my son. I really like the music that plays. It's short snippets of popular kids songs. There are a lot of different volume levels. The only thing I would change is to be able to set it to 1 Hour from the get-go (have to repress button after it shuts off after first 30 min of playing)
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: It's a great idea so plan to try again in hopes I ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out the box. Took batteries out and tried again. It span but didn't play music. Turned off and tried again, music played and it span but then spinner would not turn off. Tried again and spinner would only spin with music. Then didn't work at all. Never made it on the mobile and requested to send back day it came. It's a great idea so plan to try again in hopes I got a defective one. Will update after get another.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Jones

customer_reviews.title: Baby will now nap with mobile!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the look of the mobile we registered for, but you had to turn it to operate and the music wouldn’t last long so our baby would wake up when the music would cut off. We were able to keep the mobile components and just switch out the mechanism with this one and it works great! Our baby can now nap with the mobile on. Plays great songs and plays for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Whisenant

customer_reviews.title: Great music box for a mobile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with a mobile my parents purchased for my daughter. I wanted something easy to use with an extensive playlist. We've been home with our little girl for a few weeks, and this music box has become part of our sleep routine. I rock her in the chair while the music plays. She loves it. The music is great, and it relaxes her (and me!) so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Schilling

customer_reviews.title: great for homemade mobile!
customer_reviews.text: i made a cute little mobile for my daughter with felt and a embroidery loop. i used this to hang it on and it’s wonderful. songs are short and sweet with plenty of variation. only wish • it could be a little quieter- lowest volume is still a little loud to me but it works • could leave on longer than 30 mins. been using it for nap and bedtime for over a month and battery is still great and no issues!
customer_reviews.author: atx_walkers

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one season.
customer_reviews.text: I took good care of it. It just hung and got used here and there. It doesn't stop spinning now. The button broke, it really should last more than 4 month being that it's more expensive than the others. I thought it was better quality but I was mistaken. Buy a cheap one if this is still posted. It DID work good for a short time. Thanks. Matt
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality Better than Fisher Price
customer_reviews.text: I rate this very highly. We used it to make our own mobile, using an IKEA static mobile. As promised, it spins silently, or with music, and plays 60 songs. Lots of classic and Disney favourites. You need a screwdriver to open the battery case, as is normal with baby stuff. Two AA batteries needed, not included. This is such a fun and great quality item. Better than expected. Way better than the $60 fisher price mobile we bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: FlashLight

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of songs including some disney.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's one of the best things I've bought on Amazon. I think my favorite part is about half the songs are Disney songs. I haven't been able to pick out all of them but I know there are at least You'll be in my heart A whole new world Can you feel the love tonight Beauty and the beast Once upon a dream When you wish upon a star I'm sure there are others I don't recognize but I really do love the thing. It helps my daughter sleep and doesn't aggravate my sound sensitive head.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Kay Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. The mobile we bought was a crank only. It didn't last long at all, maybe 2 minutes with lots of turns, and it was broken at one part of the song. I just wanted to replace the music, since the rest of the mobile was cute. It's perfect. It shuts off on its own, its got a volume setting so you can even mute it if you just want it to spin, and the music is easy to listen to when you're new, overtired parents! Unfortunately it keeps our baby awake now, so we don't really use it, but when we did use it, it worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my newborns nursery several months in advance. We are just now transitioning him to the crib, and used his about 3 times until it broke. It stopped playing music first, then it just refused to turn off. We let it run until the batteries died thinking that would reset it. We replaced the batteries and it was still doing the same thing. Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Motor noise drowns out music.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this. It has such great reviews but on the unit I received, the motor to make the mobile rotate is so loud it drowns out the music unless I turn the music up all the way which would be way to loud for nap time. The music is beautiful but the motor is too loud. I will be returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Yasss!! Buy it ASAP! Works and sounds perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son and I absolutely loveeeee this musical mobile! He loves it! I hung it to his plush animal mobile and removed the manual musical piece it Fits and works perfectly! It even has a few disney songs which i love, battery doesnt die fast and music goes on for over 30 mins!! If youre kid loves music like mine does; This is so worth getting, glad i added this to his wish list Thanks auntie Z :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charming
customer_reviews.text: Excellent variety of music some recognizable movie classics from both Disney (shhh) and Studio Ghibli, as well as classical pieces. Sounds like music-box bell arrangements, very pleasant. It cycles though ALL the songs though, so you don't get bored hearing the same one on "repeat" but if you wanted to "stay" at a certain song, you are out of luck. You CAN manually cycle though the music, but it doesn't come with a song list, so you'll spend some time guessing to see if you recognize the music. Engine is strong enough to rotate standard mobile arms with hanging figures without being loud/distracting to the music. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Must have for twins
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read a review from another person that had twins and was tired of the same things I was, winding up mobiles every 2 minutes! Not to mention the motor in the Disney one I bought was horrible. It wasn’t strong enough to keep the toys moving, and they would get stuck on the pole. This product is amazing and offered me some relief for about 30 minutes at a time. Time that I desperately need considering I have 2 3-month-old twins all to myself all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price! The sound is adjustable and the spinning can be turned off if you prefer. My only complaint is that it doesn't attach to the stand. This was easily fixed with a heavy duty paper clip but it should have hooks on both ends or at least exchangeable hookups since not all stands are the same. Overall, very happy with it! Note: not sure in battery life yet as my baby is due in 7 weeks so it hasn't had a ton of use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tuttle

product_meta.title: SHILOH Baby Crib Musical Mobile Battery-Operated 60 Songs White
feature_bullets: Patented Design：This baby musical mobile is a perfect gift for your newborn baby. This new version baby musical mobile has two buttons for more functions: play/pause, previous/next track, volume control, music/rotation separation. The spin button can be separately controled.
Ultra-long Playing: 60 silvery melodies. Each song will last about 1 minute and are very classical.
Energy-saving: This baby musical mobile is powered by only 2 AA batteries(not included but commonly available ). This baby music box will automatically shut off 30 minutes later for saving energy.

Safety Guarantee: This baby musical mobile is adopted environmentally non-toxic and durable ABS material to ensure baby safety in case of biting them. You can fix this baby musical mobile on baby crib with arms or brackets, then hang toys over the hook of the musical mobile.
If you encounter any problems please feel free to contact us we will guidance you how to use the mobile.

specifications.Material Type: Baby-safe phthalate free, bpa free, lead free, latex free, ABS
specifications.Care instructions: The mobile can be installed with AA batteries only.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,236 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
